pages.text: The $(item)PCB Blueprint/$ is a special component, required in the crafting of the $(l:manufacturing/uv_light_box)UV Light Box/$.$(p)It cannot be crafted normally, but must be traded for, usually via the $(l:tools/amadron_tablet)Amadron Tablet/$, but possibly also via $(l:base_concepts/villagers)Mechanic Villagers/$.
